response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value for us, but given its importance to you, we believe it's a match made in business heaven. We propose to offer this remarkable asset to you at a price of $1,200,000. This figure reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also acknowledges the substantial benefit it would bring to you. We are confident that this proposal strikes a fair balance between our interests and your expectations. Should you find this offer appealing, please let us know, and we can proceed to finalize the details. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
